memberdef.name: secureshield_exc_handler_table

briefdescription.para: check the access control to the specified interrupt
probe the interrupt whether is pending
config the trigger level of interrupt
lock cpujust disable the interrupt belonging to current container
unlock cpujust enable the interrupt belonging to current container
allocate an interrupt to the specified container
check whether the specific int is enabled
probe the pending status of interrupt

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint32_t intno, const uint32_t level) EMBARC_LINKTO(secure_int_level_config)
memberdef.name: int_level_config

briefdescription.para: config the interrupt level triggered or pulse triggered
